scripts.test:cov: TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true TS_NODE_LOG_ERROR=true NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover --preserve-comments ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -r ts-node/register -R spec --exit "test/**/*.ts"
